attributes.action: Get David Attenborough a Nobel Peace Prize for his contributions to this planet.
attributes.additional_details:
The wildlife population has been in drastic decline since the dawn of man. However, it is indisputable that David Attenborough's lifelong commitment to educating us has contributed immensely to world peace. 

"The question is, are we happy to suppose that our grandchildren may never be able to see an elephant except in a picture book?" - David

"People must feel that the natural world is important and valuable and beautiful and wonderful and an amazement and a pleasure." - David
attributes.background: David Attenborough is undoubtably one of the greatest human beings in history and to me, the greatest living person today. He deserves a Nobel Peace Prize for his endless commitment to the peace between man and the nature that surrounds us. Please sign this petition to help give him this award.

rejection.details:
You can find out more about the prize and how it is chosen here: 
http://www.nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/peace/
